QueryResult.text: SELECT rsa.object_id resource_id, SUM (t.weight) skills_score FROM temp_rsm_rsf_skills t, rsm_skills_associations rsa, cmn_lookups i, cmn_lookups p, cmn_lookups p2 WHERE t.skill_id = rsa.skill_id AND rsa.object_code = 'resource' AND i.lookup_type = 'RSM_RESOURCE_INTLEV' AND p.lookup_type = 'RSM_RESOURCE_PROFLEV' AND p2.lookup_type = 'RSM_RESOURCE_PROFLEV' AND t.int_level = i.id AND t.prof_level = p.id AND t.prof_level2 = p2.id AND i.sort_order <= (SELECT sort_order FROM cmn_lookups WHERE id = rsa.interest_level_id) AND p.sort_order <= (SELECT sort_order FROM cmn_lookups WHERE id = rsa.proficiency_level_id) AND p2.sort_order >= (SELECT sort_order FROM cmn_lookups WHERE id = rsa.proficiency_level_id) GROUP BY rsa.object_id
